ModMetaData.name: Runtime Stability Fix (Local)
ModMetaData.author: Segas Wolf
ModMetaData.description:
## Runtime Stability Fix
### Problems Fixed: - **Highborn social gene crash**: Sequence contains no elements in Gene_SocialAffectRandom - **MultiFloors save error**: Exception in ExposePrepatcherFields - **NightmareCore graphic error**: Exception in HELPER_MakeGraphicData - **Minified thing label crash**: NullReferenceException in Label properties - **SSL certificate spam**: Curl error 60 from mod update checker - **Widget row null texture**: ButtonIcon crashes with null textures - **Float menu errors**: Various exceptions in GetOptions - **Ghost graphic crashes**: NullReferenceException in GhostGraphicFor - **Deadlife gas spewer**: Sustainer errors causing lag
### Solution: - Prefix-based guards to prevent errors before they occur - Finalizer patches with Log.WarningOnce to suppress known repetitive errors - Direct Log.Error patch to suppress SSL certificate errors
### Load Order: Place AFTER any mods that cause these errors. This is a general stability patch.
### Patches: - Patch_HighbornSocialTick: Guards social gene tick - Patch_MultiFloorsExposePrepatcherFields: Guards save operations - Patch_NightmareCoreMakeGraphicData: Guards graphic generation - Patch_MinifiedThingLabelSafety: Guards label properties - Patch_SuppressCurl60Spam: Suppresses SSL errors - Patch_WidgetRowButtonIconNullTex: Prevents null texture crashes - Patch_GrowerHarvestHasJobOnCellSafety: Guards crop operations - Patch_FloatMenuGetOptionsSafety: Guards menu generation - Patch_GhostGraphicForSafety: Provides fallback graphics - Patch_DeadlifeGasSustainerStability: Guards gas spewer sustainers
